parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Waypoints </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Adds a point guarded by the given side (scripted way of adding equivalent of "GUARDED BY" trigger in [[3DEN|Editor]]). A closest AI group in the given side with assigned "GUARD" waypoint will attempt to secure this guard point. The actual guarded position is determined via the following rules:
* Given "position" is always considered. It could be [[Object]], [[Group]], [[Position2D]] or [[Position3D]]. In every case, z coordinate will be ignored and point will be placed on nearest surface.
* If "objectMapID" is not negative, the position of the object with the given ID is used (Overrides "position"). -1 to ignore this argument. z of the object position will be intact.
* If the given "vehicle" is valid, the position of the vehicle is extracted and guarded (Overrides both "position" and "objectMapID"). [[objNull]] to ignore. z of the vehicle position will be intact.
For use with "GUARD" [[setWaypointType|waypoint]]. How does "GUARD" waypoint work: [[Waypoint:Guard]]
 </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''createGuardedPoint''' [side, position, objectMapID, vehicle] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value>  [side, position, idStatic, vehicle]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> side: [[Side]] - The side which will be guarding </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> position: [[Position]] - [[Object]], [[Group]], [[Position2D]] or [[Position3D]]</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> objectMapID: [[Number]] - static id of map object. -1 to ignore </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] - vehicle to be used for position. [[objNull]] to ignore </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER5</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[createGuardedPoint]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[east]], [0,0], -1, [[vehicle]] [[player]]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value>[[createTrigger]], [[addWaypoint]], [[setWaypointType]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
